version_description: Important bug fixes, especially for our awesome Brazilian users that may have been having issues selecting access and editing access numbers
Important bug fixes, especially for our awesome Brazilian users that may have been having issues selecting access and editing access numbers

-3D Touch!
-Reoptimized for iPhone 6/6 Plus
-Major reliability fixes to dialing in to TapeACall
-Recordings load faster

Now includes a full 7-day free trial for new users!
Now includes a full 7-day free trial for new users!
Now includes a full 7-day free trial for new users! Also adds phone calls as an option to receive your activation code, if you are having issues receiving the code via SMS.
Now includes a full 7-day free trial for new users! Also adds phone calls as an option to receive your activation code, if you are having issues receiving the code via SMS.
Activation bug fixes
Activation bug fixes
We continue to improve the user experience and make the app more stable. A highly recommended update for all users.
We continue to improve the user experience and make the app more stable. A highly recommended update for all users.
This update includes fixes for crashes on iOS 11.3.
This update includes fixes for crashes on iOS 11.3.
Improvements to make it easier to sign up
Improvements to make it easier to sign up

We're proud to announce that today's update is a completely rewritten TapeACall with greatly improved sign up, audio playback controls, sharing for recordings, and amongst other things, a much more stable app.

We have big plans for TapeACall going forward and this is just the first of many great updates. We'll be releasing app updates frequently in the coming weeks with continued improvements and additions.

Thank you so much for choosing TapeACall. We truly appreciate every single one of our users and that you've made TapeACall the #1 call recording app for iPhone!

Today we're introducing TapeACall Transcriptions! You can now transcribe any of your English language recordings into readable text with our new add-on service. We've been hard at work on this feature, along with our improved audio player, for some time and we're excited to be able to launch this to you today. Thank you for choosing TapeACall.

Today we're introducing TapeACall Transcriptions! You can now transcribe any of your English language recordings into readable text with our new add-on service. We've been hard at work on this feature, along with our improved audio player, for some time and we're excited to be able to launch this to you today. Thank you for choosing TapeACall.

• Fixed an issue where the default recording label caused problems sharing recordings to Dropbox, Google Drive, and OneDrive
• Tapping on a recording opens up the expanded player for more playback functionality
• You can now edit the name of a recording by tapping on the recording label on the expanded player
• Fixed issues that caused some recordings to not be transcribed
• Bug and visual fixes
